tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
“God sends angels when we are in trouble” I experienced this and met this angel Dr Meeta Verma, a brilliant doctor when I was detected with 7.5 cm long fibroid and enlarged uterus. When others were suggesting open surgery , she removed fibroids and uterus through laproscopy with her magical hands. She deals with the patient like a psychologist as well. She gave me all strength and confidence that made my recovery so smooth.
Thank you so much Dr Meeta Verma. I simply love you and believe you more than myself. You are a genuine soul and excellent gynaecologist.

** **** ***** * *** ** *** **** ************* * **** **** ****** ** ***** **** I reside in Gurgaon and visited 3-4 Gynaecologists here for my pregnancy in the top hospitals. However, I was not satisfied, nor I was given proper medication. I was misguided by a doctor here who works in a top hospital (I do not wish to name) last year. The procedures done were just not satisfactory, and it landed up spoiling my health further.

Then, one of my family member, referred Dr Mita (she is in Moolchand Hospital and has a clinic in Lajpat Nagar, Delhi). I met her and the way she explained things (considering first pregnancy), gave me medication, took extra care was incredible. She doesn't recommend extra or unnecessary tests, and always gives logic on what and why she is recommending any procedure or test. She is professional in her approach, yet personal if you are stressed (yes, this is common in pregnancy!). I have been visiting her for 1.5 years, and finally only because of her guidance and support, I’m blessed with a baby boy. She isn’t just a doctor for me, but a well-wisher. On my delivery, she was equally happy, like my family. I will recommend her to everyone who is planning their family, or even have issues related. *** ** *** *********** ***************

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: *** **** ** *** ** *** **** ******* * **** **** Her support and guidance led us to have a baby boy recently. We have been trying for the past two years, however due to some complications I wasn’t able to conceive. There were a number of doctors we approached, and we spent a lot of money on tests and diagnosis. We met Dr. Mita after one of our colleagues mentioned her to us. My endometriosis was treated by her, and then active treatment for pregnancy was begun. *** ***** ******** *********** ****** *** ** **** ************* *** gives extra care to each of her patients. We trusted her and followed her instructions religiously. By God’s grace we have become parents of a beautiful baby. For us, Dr. Mita is like a mother. She is kind, humble* ************** and always polite when it comes to answering questions. Like a mother, she has a good reason for being a little strict. This is her love and passion for her patients. We are sincerely thankful to her for making this possible.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
*** **** ***** ** ** ********* ****** **** ********** ****** ** ********* *** ********** Her personality has a very calming and warm effect on both her patients and her staff. 

Visited her after experiencing severe menstrual pains and was suggested total hysterectomy after diagnosis. The case was already tough due to having two caesarean deliveries but Dr. Mita Verma handled this with great approach and foresight. 

Recovered well in time with proper medication and expert guidance from the doctor. She made an intricate procedure look very easy. Highly recommend her.

My laproscopic hysterectomy was done by Dr. Mita Verma. She has been my gynac since the birth of my son in 2012. She was aware of all the medical complications that I have. I am allergic to different groups of medicines (as I had TEN) however she is the only doctor who I could trust to take care of this surgery. She has been doing laproscopic surgery since it started in India. That is why I feel she is one of the best in this procedure...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Mita is a very friendly and considerate doctor. She understands your problem in detail and after thorough analysis she advises for treatment. I had severe and painful fibroid and she suggested surgery to remove the same. After removal of it i.e. Fibroid treatment via Laparascopic Myometomy, I dont feel anymore heaviness or bloatedness. I have recovered in few days all because of proper diet, medicine and right approach as advised by doctor.Sincere thanks and regards to such a talented doctor. Thanks for being there mam..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Doctor is very friendly and open. She explained my problem in detail and I am completely satisfied with her feedback. Will definitely recommend her. She is a professional.
